prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a heavily weathered, vintage Tonka dump truck from the 1950s. The truck is red and yellow, with significant rust, chipped paint, and dents. It sits on cracked asphalt, partially overgrown with weeds. Focus is on the details of the weathering and the iconic Tonka logo. Dramatic lighting from a low sun angle, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: old-tonka-trucks-value-image-1.png

prompt: A pristine, fully restored 1960s Tonka Mighty Crane truck displayed in a brightly lit, professional studio setting. The truck is a vibrant yellow with chrome accents, showcasing its original condition. The background is a seamless white backdrop, providing a clean and uncluttered look. The composition is centered, emphasizing the crane's functionality and design. Soft, diffused lighting eliminates harsh shadows. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: old-tonka-trucks-value-image-2.png

prompt: A wide-angle shot of a child's playroom, overflowing with toys. In the foreground, a collection of various vintage Tonka trucks (dump trucks, bulldozers, cement mixers) are arranged on a worn, colorful playmat. The room is bathed in warm, natural light streaming through a window. Soft focus on the background to emphasize the Tonka trucks. The overall feel is nostalgic and playful. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6

prompt: A detailed macro shot of a vintage Tonka truck's metal grill and headlight. The grill is heavily rusted, with remnants of red paint. The headlight lens is cracked and dusty. This evokes a sense of history and decay. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6

prompt: A split-screen composition. On the left, a black and white archival photograph of children playing with Tonka trucks in a sandbox during the 1950s. On the right, a color photograph of a modern collector carefully cleaning and restoring the same type of Tonka truck in their workshop. The lighting on the left is natural and slightly grainy, while the lighting on the right is bright and controlled. This contrast highlights the passage of time and the enduring appeal of Tonka trucks. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
